title: Regional Sales manager
skills: Starting a business within new country and areas. Start up repoffices, companies, warehouses, customs procedures, and launch new products to the market. Direct sales, first person negotiations. Key customers development. creation of  sales plans, marketing strategies, selection of personnel, budgeting. Responsibility.

experience.description:
Finding and attracting new clients, working with existing clients, maintaining
negotiations, conclusion of contracts with customers.
Visiting factories and construction sites, discussion and training in the use of tools and consumables, presentations of new products.
Monitoring of competitors (prices, assortment, advertising activities).
Formation of tasks for sales representatives and technical service.

Stalex LLC is the representation company of Nova-trading S.A.
All the same duties.

Nova Trading Russia is a doughter company of polish biggest service center of stainless steels- Nova Trading S.A. Main activity is trading of all kinds of stainless steel materials as sheets, plates, coils, tubes, wires etc. Service of splitting, cutting, polishing, 
Main goal is to find new big customers producers, who need special stainless stell products. Such as food equipment producers, lift producers, tanks producers, restorant and kithcen equipment producers.
My main activities were to get new sales managers, organize and manage sales team. finding new  possibilities, new customers. Business trips all over Russia, visiting customers. 
Follow up existing customers. Training or RSMs.
Custom clearence and logistic issues were within my duties  as well.
 Reporting to head office with financial reports, business reports, visit reports, marketing situations, work out plans and budgets.

Start up the new type of business at the company. Main business iadea was to focus on Production of wearparts, using wear resistant steels.
My main task is directing of all sales activities, look for new customers, increase the customer base. Organize  and proceed sales department and technical eduation. Made a lot of presentations at the customer's bases. Negotiations with DMP of customers on terms and conditions, conducting contracts, follow up payments etc. Contacting with foreign steel producers on purchasing steel plates.

Responsible of all kind of business activities in CIS countries. Organized branches in Novosibirsk, Moscow, Ekaterinburg. My personal sales area – North-West of Russia, Belorussia, Establishing stock, customs clearance, transportation and logistics. Taking care of existing direct business customers and stock customers as well. Founding new customers, developing market. Marketing activities, advertisement. Developing processing of steel service for the customers. Organization of technical service and support. Making forecast and sales budged for the area. Manage the team of 10-12 RSM and customer service.

experience.company: Novosibirsk repoffice of SSAB Oxelosund AB
experience.description:
Established and registrated repoffice. Organized stock in Novosibirsk. Responsible sales area – All Siberia including Urals, Kazakhstan, Mongolia, Kirgizstan, Uzbekistan.
Opened new sales area for wear resistant steels. Found out new customers. Marketing activities, advertising, and exhibitions.

Responsible for territory in Western Siberia: Omsk, Novosibirsk, Kemerovo, Krasnoyarsk, Barnaul. In submission of 17 sales representatives in the cities. Setting targets sales representatives, control. Implementation of the plan of sales and delivery of products to customers in key regions. Making presentations and negotiating with key customers in the region. Compilation of reports, plans, projections, and competition to head office. Track receivables. Development of plans for promotion and advertising campaigns on their territory. Recruitment. During the time the work was created by a team of sales representatives, sales have risen by 30-40% compared to last year. The first place to implement the plan of sales among all the territories for the 3rd quarter.

Selling FMCG, produced the parent company (Johnson & Johnson) in the territory of Western Siberia.
Working with key customers and shops. The opening of a warehouse in Novosibirsk.
Conduct trainings with wholesalers distributors. Control payments. Negotiations at the level of the first persons.
Organization and control of the sales representatives.
Before the crisis of 1998 annual sales in the territory reached of $ 10 million

experience.position: senior expert in foreighn affairs department
experience.description:
Research in various catalytic processes. Sales of  production licenses for catalysts, processes, products using catalysts worldwide.
Carrying out all foreign economic relations at the Institute. Organizing and conducting negotiations with foreign partners. Drafting of contracts and licensing agreements with partners around the world. Track payments on them. Reporting management of sales and revenues. Prepare presentations of inventions made in the institute in the world market. Preparation of documents for patents, patent tracking.

Main activity of company was production and sales of military planes -
SU 25. Our department was responsible of saling spare parts for sold planes and for import consumer goods.

professional_roles.name: Менеджер по продажам, менеджер по работе с клиентами
